text: Waleed Al-Shangeati (; born 9 January 1994) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a striker for Al-Qadsiah . ==Career== Al-Shangeati began his career at the youth team of Ohod and left the club and joined fellow Olympic team Al- Shabab on January 30, 2013 . left Al-Shabab and signed with Najran on loan for the 2016–17 season on August 4, 2016 . left Al-Shabab and signed with Al- Qadsiah on June 20, 2017 left Al-Qadsiah and signed with Al-Washm on loan for the 2018–19 season on July 12, 2018 . left Al-Qadsiah again and signed with Najran on loan for the 2019–20 season on July 29, 2019 . Al-Qadsiah agreed with Najran to restore Al-Shanqeeti, who has been loaned since the beginning of the season, to represent the team in the coming period on January 20, 2020 . ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Ohod Club players Category:Al-Shabab FC (Riyadh) players Category:Najran SC players Category:Al-Qadsiah FC players Category:Al-Washm Club players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players
title: Waleed Al-Shangeati
